typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		Partner as string,
		Year as string,
		month as string,
		month_presence as string,
		country_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		country as string,
		Partner as string,
		Year as short,
		month as short,
		month_presence as double,
		country_name as string
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['census_parquet'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
